title: Architecture of Japan
brief_description: Shows how the traditional architectural design elements based on wooden construction are adopted to the steel and concrete in contemporary building in Japan. Examples of historical, traditional and modern architecture which are distinctively Japanese are surveyed.
description: Shows how the traditional architectural design elements based on wooden construction are adopted to the steel and concrete in contemporary building in Japan. Examples of historical, traditional and modern architecture which are distinctively Japanese are surveyed.
